advancedSettings.fees.title: Colony pays my gas fees
advancedSettings.fees.description: Enable this to have the Metacolony cover your gas fees when performing actions on Colony. All you need to do is sign it. This is currently supported on select chains.
advancedSettings.fees.tooltip: Disabling this option means you will have to pay your own gas fees.

You will pay your own gas fees on all chains.

advancedSettings.rpc.description: If you prefer maximum decentralization, you may use your own custom endpoints for Colony
advancedSettings.rpc.subtitle: Gnosis Chain Custom RPC

advancedSettings.delete.modal.title: We're sorry to see you go
advancedSettings.delete.modal.descriptio: Deleting your account means you could potentially lose funds and access to the following areas and account information on Colony. {br} {br} While you can delete your Colony account, you are not able to delete  content on chain. {br} {br} Deleting your Colony account is irreversible and you will need to recreate another Colony account.
advancedSettings.delete.modal.info2: You will lose your account settings
advancedSettings.delete.modal.info3: You will lose all of your Colony DAO subscriptions
advancedSettings.delete.modal.info4: You will lose your comment history
advancedSettings.delete.modal.info5: You will lose access to your username
advancedSettings.delete.modal.checkbox.l: I understand that deleted accounts aren't recoverable
colonyDetailsPage.title: Colony Details
colonyDetailsPage.description: Change the details of the Colony
colonyDetailsPage.objectiveDescription: Colony objectives area the main goal or mission of the Colony all member’s are contributing towards. The objective appears on the main Dashboard of the Colony and progress of the goal is visible. {br} {br} Each update requires a motion progress or the correct Colony wide permissions.
colonyDetailsPage.noObjectiveBoxDescript: There are no objectives set for the Colony. Once created, the objective will update here.

extensionsPage.description: Extend the functionality of your Colony
extensionsPage.permissions: Permissions the extension needs in the colony
advancedPage.title: Advanced settings
advancedPage.colony.title: Colony version
advancedPage.recovery.title: Recovery Mode
advancedPage.recovery.description: If you believe that something dangerous is happening in your colony (e.g. the Colony is under attack), recovery mode will disable the colony and prevent further activity until the issue has been overcome.
advancedPage.recovery.notification: Note: Leaving recovery requires the approval of a majority of members holding the Recovery permission.
advancedPage.version.success: Your Colony version is up to date
advancedPage.version.warning: An upgrade for your Colony is available
calamityBanner.available: A new version of the Colony Network is available!
calamityBanner.recoveryMode: The Colony is in Recovery mode. You are unable to perform any actions until Recovery Mode is exited.
extensionUninstall.toast.description.suc: You can reinstall the extension at anytime
extensionUninstall.toast.description.err: Due to a transaction error, the extension could not be uninstalled.
extensionDetailsPage.uninstallDescriptio: Uninstalling this extension will permanently delete all actions associated with this extension from this Colony. Ensure you understand the potential risks before continuing.
extensionDetailsPage.uninstallBoxOne: All actions will disappear from the application and can never be recovered.
extensionDetailsPage.uninstallBoxTwo: Please ensure that all funds in processes associated with this extension are claimed by their owners before uninstalling. Not doing so will result in permanent loss of the unclaimed funds.
extensionDetailsPage.uninstallConfirmati: I understand that there is a risk of lost funds and past actions will disappear from the interface.
extensionDetailsPage.deprecateDescriptio: This extension must first be deprecated if you wish to uninstall it. After deprecation, any actions using this extension that are already underway may be completed, but it will no longer be possible to create new actions from this extension.
extensionDeprecate.toast.description.err: The extension could not be deprecated
extensionDetailsPage.confirmation: Are you sure you wish to proceed?
extensionReEnable.modal.title: Re-enable extension
extensionReEnable.modal.subTitle: The extension will be re-enabled with the same parameters. Are you sure you wish to proceed?
extensionEnable.toast.description.error: The extension could not be enabled
extensionReEnable.toast.description.erro: The extension could not be re-enabled

actionSidebar.tooltip.createdIn: Team responsible for decision-making and action execution.
actionSidebar.tooltip.description: Rationale and context behind the action.
actionSidebar.tooltip.simplePayment.reci: Member or address designated to receive the funds.
actionSidebar.tooltip.simplePayment.amou: Quantity and type of funds of the payment.
actionSidebar.tooltip.simplePayment.addi: Option to combine multiple payments with the same token.
actionSidebar.tooltip.advancedPayment.re: Member or address designated to receive the funds.
actionSidebar.tooltip.advancedPayment.am: Quantity and type of funds of the payment.
actionSidebar.tooltip.advancedPayment.cl: Time interval between the approved release of funds and being able to claim the funds, it works as a security delay or a way to schedule payments.
actionSidebar.tooltip.batchPayment.recip: Member or address designated to receive the funds.
actionSidebar.tooltip.batchPayment.amoun: Quantity and type of funds of the payment.
actionSidebar.tooltip.batchPayment.token: Token type used for the payment.
actionSidebar.tooltip.splitPayment.descr: The way in which the payment should be divided.
actionSidebar.tooltip.splitPayment.amoun: Quantity and type of funds of the payment.
actionSidebar.tooltip.splitPayment.recip: Member or address designated to receive the funds.
actionSidebar.tooltip.splitPayment.perce: Proportional division of funds for recipients.
actionSidebar.tooltip.stagedPayment.reci: Member or address designated to receive the funds.
actionSidebar.tooltip.stagedPayment.mile: Specific phase or stage associated with the payment.
actionSidebar.tooltip.stagedPayment.amou: Quantity and type of funds for the milestone.
actionSidebar.tooltip.streamingPayment.r: Member or address receiving the streaming funds.
actionSidebar.tooltip.streamingPayment.s: Start date of streaming payment. Regardless of approval date, total claimable funds is calculated from this date.
actionSidebar.tooltip.streamingPayment.e: The end condition for the streaming payment, with the options: "When cancelled": Indefinite, will only end when it is cancelled. "Limit is reached": Will end once a defined limit of total tokens have been streamed. "Fixed time": Will end at a provided specific time and date.
actionSidebar.tooltip.streamingPayment.a: Funds to be streamed over the chosen "Amount per" period.
Defines the streaming rate, i.e. per Day, Week, Month. (e.g., 500 CLNY/Month).
actionSidebar.tooltip.streamingPayment.l: The total amount of funds that can be earned for this streaming payment.
actionSidebar.tooltip.createAgreement.de: Detailed explanation of the agreement. Including any necessary details, explanations, rationale, and relevant references.
actionSidebar.tooltip.mintTokens.amount: The total amount of new tokens.
actionSidebar.tooltip.manageTokens.appro: List of approved tokens in the Colony.
actionSidebar.tooltip.manageTokens.token: The name of the tokens visible in the Colony.
actionSidebar.tooltip.manageTokens.symbo: The symbol of the corresponding token.

actionSidebar.tooltip.manageReputation.t: The team reputation is being managed in.

motion.exitRecovery.storageSlots.warning: Warning! This makes permanent changes to the storage slots of funds within the Colony.
motion.exitRecovery.storageSlots.form.de: Storage slots are where funds of the Colony are held on chain. If the current storage slot is comprised, a new storage slot can be assigned using a hex value. This is an optional change while exiting recovery mode.

role.description: This member has the {role} permission bundle that includes the following permissions:
actionSidebar.tooltip.authority: Whether they have the authority to take actions on their own, or require others with the same multi-sig permission to approve as well.
permissions.custom.root.overview: Take actions effecting the Colony as a whole.
permissions.custom.administration.overvi: Create and manage all types Advanced Payments and general moderation tasks.
permissions.custom.architecture.overview: Create teams and manage permissions in sub-teams.
permissions.custom.funding.overview: Fund expenditures and transfer funds between teams.
permissions.custom.recovery.overview: Disable the Colony in an emergency, update storage and approve Colony reactivation.
permissions.custom.arbitration.overview: Resolve disputes, make state changes and punish bad behavior.
actionSidebar.managePermissions.tableDes: Allows the member to take the following actions in this Colony:
actionSidebar.managePermissions.roleSele: Authority to perform general moderation tasks.
All Mod authorities as well as creating and executing any type of payment action.
All Payer authorities as well as additional admin actions such as creating teams.
Authority to perform all actions. Should only be given to highly trusted members or contracts.
Advanced permission control, allowing any combination of contract level permissions.
The ability to remove permissions from any address or contract in the selected team.
actionSidebar.managePermissions.permissi: List of the permission types and the corresponding actions that can be executed when such permissions are granted. While permissions...

List of the permission types and the corresponding actions that can be executed when such permissions are granted. While permissions can be allocated to any wallet or contract address, a Colony can be structured so that no individual possesses any permissions.

However, it's crucial that at least one address holds the 'owner' permission. This owner role can be assigned to a contract, like the 'Reputation' Decision Method extension, which facilitates decentralized control via reputation.
Specific permissions that can be assigned:
All of the actions within Payer, plus:
All of the actions within Mod, plus:
All of the actions within Admin, plus:
actionSidebar.managePermissions.authorit: The Mod permission does not support multi-sig authority.
createColonyWizard.step.colonyName.descr: Let’s set up your Colony. Enter a name for your Colony and a short description about your Colony’s mission and purpose.
createColonyWizard.step.colonyName.urlSu: You can change your Colony’s name, but not the URL. Choose carefully.
createColonyWizard.step.selectToken.head: Creating a new native token or use existing?
createColonyWizard.step.selectToken.desc: We highly recommend creating a new token, you will have greater control of your token going forward, support all features of Colony, and potential save a lot of cost if on another chain.
createColonyWizard.step.selectToken.crea: Quickest, easiest, and best option for greater control over your token using your Colony.
createColonyWizard.step.selectToken.sele: Suitable for public tokens. Requires token to be on the same blockchain as the Colony.
createColonyWizard.step.nativeToken.head: Your Colony’s native token
createColonyWizard.step.nativeToken.desc: Your native token is your organization’s unit of ownership, and powers key features within your Colony.{br}{br}Tokens are initially locked and not transferable by recipients. You must unlock your token if you wish it to become tradable.
createColonyWizard.step.nativeToken.toke: The token logo will only exist on Colony and can be changed at anytime.
createColonyWizard.step.confirm.heading: Confirm your Colony’s details
createColonyWizard.step.confirm.descript: Check to ensure your Colony’s details are correct as they can not be changed later.
createColonyWizard.step.transactiosn.des: Deploying to the blockchain requires you to sign a transaction in your wallet for each step.
errors.colonyObjective.title: Colony objective title is required
